data.text: I've improved the performance of the attorney and court lookups by 90% and also don't cache any of the results to the IIS Pool. Please test on UAT and let me know if all is still functional so that we can release to LIVE asap. Willem is currently investigating the service for any performance fixes.  @willemhuman @jakovanrensburg @yasserogier @cobuspienaar @neilbosworth @sameerkumandan1 @johnfrier
